DOC.brief_summary: The trial intends to see how the two different products, the medical device in micro-enema and the drug given by mouth, act in giving the child regular evacuation after 1 week of daily use, 1 week of use every other day and 2 weeks of use "as needed". The hypothesis is that the protective micro-enema will help to achieve regular evacuation by its local antinflammatory non pharmacological action. This hypothesis comes from the observation that local anal inflammation can cause functional constipation due to discomfort and pain during evacuation or by influencing reflexes.
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness & Safety of Natural Microenemas Against Oral Macrogol 4000 in Chronic Constipation in Children 6-24 Months
